headline: Nasdaq Halts Robot Consulting Co., Ltd.
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Nasdaq Stock Market® (Nasdaq: NDAQ) announced that trading is halted in Robot Consulting Co., Ltd. (Nasdaq: LAWR) for additional information requested from the company. Previously, the Securities and Exchange Commission effected a trading suspension in PC from 04:00:00 on October 23, 2025 to 23:59:00 on November 5, 2025. The last sale price of the company’s ordinary shares was $3.75. More information about the SEC’s order can be found at https://ww
